org.jetlang.fibers

Class ThreadFiber

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetlang.fibers.ThreadFiber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, Disposable, DisposingExecutor, Scheduler, Fiber

    public class ThreadFiber
extends Object
implements Fiber
    Fiber implementation backed by a dedicated thread for execution.

      • schedule

        public Disposable schedule(Runnable command,
                  long delay,
                  TimeUnit unit)
        Schedule a Runnable to execute in the future. Event will be executed on Fiber thread.
        Specified by:
        schedule in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        command - the task to execute
        delay - the time from now to delay execution
        unit - the time unit of the delay parameter
        Returns:
        a Disposable that can be used to cancel execution

                             long initialDelay,

                             TimeUnit unit)
        Schedule recurring event. Event will be fired on fiber thread.
        Specified by:
        scheduleAtFixedRate in interface Scheduler
        Parameters:
        command - the task to execute
        initialDelay - the time to delay first execution
        delay - the delay
        unit - the time unit of the initialDelay and delay parameters
        Returns:
